content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron plate factory at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (2.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (4.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (6.0, 0.0)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to furnaces having no ingredients to smelt
- Ensure that the furnaces have the required ingredients to smelt. Check the inventory and supply the necessary materials to avoid the "no ingredients to smelt" warning.
